mapper.insert: INSERT INTO configfile (id, name, tenant_id, project_id, cluster_id, cluster_name, description, tags, create_time, creator, reponame, item, path) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{tenantId}, #{projectId}, #{clusterId}, #{clusterName}, #{description}, #{tags}, #{createTime}, #{user}, #{repoName}, #{items}, #{path})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM configfile WHERE name = #{name} AND project_id = #{projectId} AND reponame = #{repoName} ORDER BY tags DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE conItem, con FROM configfile_item conItem right JOIN configfile con ON conItem.configfile_id = con.id WHERE con.id = #{id} AND con.project_id = #{projectId}
DELETE conItem, con FROM configfile_item conItem right JOIN configfile con ON conItem.configfile_id = con.id WHERE con.project_id = #{projectId}
